verbs.description: Iran [V: has] condemned Israel ’s attacks on its forces inside Syria as the crisis in the Middle East worsens following US President Trump ’s decision to pull out of the 2015 nuclear accord .

[ARG0: Iran] has [V: condemned] [ARG1: Israel ’s attacks on its forces inside Syria] [ARGM-TMP: as the crisis in the Middle East worsens following US President Trump ’s decision to pull out of the 2015 nuclear accord] .
Iran has condemned Israel ’s attacks on its forces inside Syria as the crisis in the Middle East worsens [V: following] [ARG2: US President Trump ’s decision to pull out of the 2015 nuclear accord] .
Iran has condemned Israel ’s attacks on its forces inside Syria as the crisis in the Middle East worsens following US President Trump ’s decision to [V: pull] out [ARG1: of the 2015 nuclear accord] .
